rukus.text: Li send cxiel akv por your trink kresk arb your benefit
Kun gxi Li kresk vi crops oliv dat palm grapes all kinds da frukt. This est (sufficient) proof popol pens
Li commits en your service nokt tag tro as sun lun. Ankaux stel committed His ordon. These est (sufficient) proofs popol kompren
Kaj (Li kre) por vi ter ajx de various kolor. This est (sufficient) proof popol pren heed
Li committed mar dejxor vi; vi mangx el gxi tender viand ekstrakt jewelry vi wear Vi seg sxip roaming gxi your commercial benefits vi streb His bounties vi est appreciative
Li ej stabilizers (mont) ter lest gxi tumbles vi tro as river roads vi direkt
landmarks ankaux as stel; al uz navigation
est 1 who kre 1 who ne kre? Vi tuj pren heed
Vi count di blessings vi possibly ne encompass them. DI est Forgiver Merciful
DI kon whatever vi conceal whatever vi deklar
As por idols ili set DI ili ne kre anything; ili kre
Ili est dead ne alive ili ne hav ide kiel when ili resurrected
